name: Cuber (Taximus)
description:
Cuber is a hyper casual game which requires certain amount of skill. Move around the platform, go between obstacles and make your way to the end .

Features
  • 3 levels of different difficulty
  • Dodgning obstacles on your way
  • Special extra hard level in the end
Gameplay

Your character may only move left and right to avoid getting hit by obstacles on its way. Your job is to survive till the end of the third floor which has insanely hard finish, if you get hit by one obstacle, your game restarts and you start from the beggining.

Controls
  • AD  or ←→ for left and right movement
Credits

Programmer/Game Designer/Level Designer: Ante Tavra

Special thanks to my mentor Cwekii <3
